name: hmehra's Home
body:
### Welcome to my homepage
I am a graduate student at the University of Southern California. I am pursuing my Masters in Computer Science with a little inclination towards Computer Networks. I am interested in funky Open source Projects. Ping me if you think I can help.  
After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

#### [Movies that I have watched](./Movies.html)
#### [TV series that I Have watched](./TV.html)

### Designer Templates
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
